name: Userstyles.org - Author's Style Table Styled
description:
It's nothing too helpful.

Gives the table borders/grid lines.  Adds some coloring, too.  J5168kjjkjkww.

Please read additional info.
additional_info:
There's some kind of quirk with border-collapse or maybe I'm not using it correctly - it's supposed to make adjoining cells share/merge their borders, so that it doesn't look like you have 4px border thickness when you set it 2px.  It seems okay at default zoom, but at a zoomed-in state, there is discrepancy of border thickness here and there.

Using Firefox 5.0
